scripts.start: powershell -Command "$ip = (Get-NetIPAddress -AddressFamily IPv4 | Where-Object { $_.InterfaceAlias -match 'Wi-Fi|WiFi' -and $_.IPAddress -like '192.168.*' } | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty IPAddress); Write-Host 'n8n running at: http://'$ip':5678'; cross-env N8N_EDITOR_BASE_URL=http://$($ip):5678 WEBHOOK_URL=http://$($ip):5678 dotenv -e .env -- n8n start"
